homepage.title: As steadfast as a bull, defending Taiwan's future!
homepage.subtitle:
I am Dou Lihan, upholding justice and seeking harmony.
Hoping to shape a better tomorrow together with humanity.
homepage.donateSubtitle:
Your small donation
fuels the future of every furry friend!
homepage.donateTotal: The current total of small donations:987,655,873
homepage.selfIntroductionOne: Enhancing dog welfare uplifts Taiwan's future—dog therapy improves health, boosts work enthusiasm, stimulates the economy, and benefits GDP.
homepage.selfIntroductionTwo: Hence, I aim to promote legislative policies ensuring the well-being of both dogs and humans for a happier Taiwan!
homepage.sloganContent: Today's shelter isn't silent anymore. To spotlight our furry friends, we hosted an unprecedented 'Model Pet Fashion Show.！
